BR.name: My Western Horse 3D
BR.description: Suba no seu cabalo, bote suas botas e experimente a emoção de uma aventura de cavalgada no faroeste. Karla sonha em ser uma grande estrela do hipismo do faroeste - mas antes de começar, ela terá que demostrar à tia Polly que tem responsabilidade e talento. Ela pode realizar o seu sonho treinando duro no picadeiro e cuidando do seu cavalo com carinho. Logo ela ganhará a confiança de sua tia mal-humorada, e com isso, acesso às disciplinas mais populares do hipismo do faroeste. No Salto de Obstáculo e na Prova de Rédeas ela finalmente poderá mostrar o seu talento. A cada lição de equitação, ela melhorará suas habilidades e poderá participar de emocionantes campeonatos. Caraterísticas: Os cavalos podem ser customizados pelo jogador Inclui disciplinas populares como Prova de Rédeas e Salto de Obstáculo 3 novos campeonatos e 3 rotas diferentes para fazer trilha Uma gama extensiva de produtos para o cuidado do cavalo e equipamentos para montar Campeonato de beleza para cavalos do faroeste

CA.name: My Western Horse 3D
CA.description: Jump into the saddle, get your chaps on and experience the thrills of a western riding adventure! Karla is dreaming of being a big star in western riding – but before she can start a career she needs to convince her aunt Polly of her sense of responsibility and talent. She can achieve her goal by hard training in the riding hall and the loving care of her horse. Soon she wins her grouchy aunts’ trust and with this she gains access to the most popular disciplines of western riding. In Reining and Barrel Race she can finally show her talent. With every riding lesson she can improve her skills and participate in exciting tournaments. Features: Horse can be customized by the player Includes the popular disciplines Reining and Barrel Race 3 different tournaments and 3 different routes to hike out Extensive range of horse care products, riding gear Beauty contest for western horses

MX.name: My Western Horse 3D
MX.description: ¡Salta a la silla, ponte el sombrero y disfruta de la emoción de una aventura en el lejano oeste! Karla sueña con ser una estrella del rodeo en el oeste, pero antes de comenzar su carrera debe convencer a su tía Polly de que es una chica responsable y tiene mucho talento. Puede conseguir su objetivo entrenando duro en el centro de rodeo y cuidando de su caballo. En muy poco tiempo consigue la confianza de su tía y consecuentemente accede a las disciplinas más populares del rodeo del oeste. En las carreras de Reining y Barriles por fin puede demostrar su talento. Con cada lección de rodeo puede mejorar sus habilidades y participar en fascinantes torneos... Características: El caballo puede ser personalizado. Incluye las populares disciplinas de Reining y Carrera de Barriles. 3 torneos diferentes y 3 rutas diferentes que explorar. Una amplia gama de productos para el cuidado de los caballos. Concurso de belleza para caballos del oeste.

US.name: My Western Horse 3D
US.description: Jump into the saddle, get your chaps on and experience the thrills of a western riding adventure! Karla is dreaming of being a big star in western riding – but before she can start a career she needs to convince her aunt Polly of her sense of responsibility and talent. She can achieve her goal by hard training in the riding hall and the loving care of her horse. Soon she wins her grouchy aunts’ trust and with this she gains access to the most popular disciplines of western riding. In Reining and Barrel Race she can finally show her talent. With every riding lesson she can improve her skills and participate in exciting tournaments. Features: Horse can be customized by the player Includes the popular disciplines Reining and Barrel Race 3 different tournaments and 3 different routes to hike out Extensive range of horse care products, riding gear Beauty contest for western horses
